document_data.name: Jolly Warrior Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Jolly Warrior Inn''' was a posh and expensive inn located in [[Westgate]].
document_data.Location: The Jolly Warrior Inn was located just inside the [[West Gate (Westgate)|West GAte]] on [[Westgate Market Street]].
document_data.Services: The Jolly Warrior catered mostly to visiting nobles in search of a relaxing atmosphere.{{Cite dragon/428/Backdrop: Westgate|9}}
document_data.History: In [[1357 DR]], [[Giogioni Wyvernspur]], a nobleman on a mission for [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]], stayed at the Jolly Warrior Inn. Even though the city was on lockdown after an explosion that lit up the skies that caused the deaths of [[Mistinarperadnacles Hai Draco]] and the Abomination of [[Moander]], and another explosion the day later that signaled the death of the evil wizard [[Cassana]], Giogioni was able to enter the city and reach the Inn.
